text: Steps have been taken to supply electricity for three public places in Kamburupitiya Divisional Secretary Division in Matara District through provincial funds utilized in development activities in Southern Province.Accordingly, connections will be provided to Sri Devananda Preschool in Ransegoda Purana Viharaya, Ullala West Grama Niladhari's Office and Sapugoda Grama Niladhari's Office. Rs. 64,600 has been allocated in this regard.
title: Electricity for three public places in Kamburupitiya through provincial funds
